name: order-ewallet
title: E-Wallet
description: Melakukan pemesanan Saldo E-Wallet ke nomor tujuan.

parameters.name: target_number
parameters.label: Nomor Tujuan
parameters.placeholder: Nomor HP yang terdaftar di Gojek

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/order-ewallet \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"auth_token":"USER_TOKEN", "auth_username":"USER_USERNAME", "target_number":"081234567890", "voucher_id":"123"}'
